reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Other Services - Contract Advisory and Assistance Service Management and Professional Support Services. Other Services - Contract Advisory and Assistance Service Individual Experts and Consultants. TPC INL/WHP Administrative Assistant II

description.narrative: Management and professional support services generally aim at improving the efficiency or effectiveness of management or administrative systems and normally take the form of information, opinion, advice, training or direct assistance. Contracts may be with firms or individuals.. Covers individual experts and consultants possessing special, current knowledge, and skill which may be combined with extensive operational experience. They provide information, opinions, advice, or recommendations that enhance understanding of complex issues or improve the quality and timeliness of policy development and decision-making. Contract experts and consultants do not supervise or perform operating functions nor do they receive direct supervision. Contract experts and consultants serving on advisory committees are to be assigned to subobject code 2505.. Prog/Dev & Support - Domestic. Information has been redacted in accordance with the two principled exceptions defined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act (FATAA) of 2016: the health and security of implementing partners, and the national interest of the United States.
